description: The Surface Laptop Studio 2 is a versatile device offering a seamless transition between laptop, stage, and studio modes, with high performance for professional tasks.
Surface Laptop Go 3 is a lightweight and portable laptop designed for everyday tasks with a responsive touch display.
The 7th Edition of the Microsoft Surface Laptop offers powerful performance and a sleek design ideal for work and play.
The MacBook Pro M3 is equipped with the latest Apple Silicon chip for unrivaled performance and power efficiency, perfect for intensive professional use.
The MacBook Air is known for its thin and lightweight design, featuring Apple's M-series chip for smooth multitasking and efficiency.
The MacBook Pro offers powerful performance with the M-series chip, excellent display quality, and advanced audio features.
The Sony Alpha 1 (A1) is a flagship full-frame mirrorless camera offering exceptional speed, high resolution, and professional-level video capabilities.
Specification: 50.1 MP full-frame stacked Exmor RS CMOS sensor

description: The Sony A7R V is known for its high-resolution imaging, advanced autofocus system, and superb dynamic range, perfect for detailed photography.
Specification: 61 MP full-frame back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor

description: The Nikon Z9 is a professional full-frame mirrorless camera with groundbreaking features, designed for both photography and video professionals.
Specification: Dual CFexpress Type B card slots

description: The AirPods 4 offer an immersive sound experience with enhanced noise cancellation and a longer battery life, designed for seamless integration with Apple devices.
Specification: Spatial audio with dynamic head tracking
Up to 30 hours total battery life with charging case

description: Galaxy Buds 3 Pro are premium earbuds from Samsung with excellent sound quality, adaptive ANC, and a comfortable fit.
Specification: Hi-Fi sound quality with 24-bit audio support
Up to 29 hours total battery life with charging case

description: The Apple Watch SE 2 combines essential features for a great smartwatch experience with advanced health and fitness tracking.
Specification: Up to 18 hours of battery life

description: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 is designed for adventurers and athletes, offering rugged design and advanced performance features.
Specification: Up to 36 hours of battery life
